General.Name: Lapidoth-Heletz Limited Partnership
General.Description: Lapidoth-Heletz Limited Partnership engages in the exploration and production of oil and gas properties in Israel. The company is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. Lapidoth-Heletz Limited Partnership is a subsidiary of Lapidoth Capital Ltd.
